encumbrance_system.description: Weight-based encumbrance system affecting combat, stealth, fatigue, and travel

encumbered.description: You are heavily burdened, every step is laborious and dangerous

special_restrictions.cannot_flee: Cannot flee from combat at distances 0-3
special_restrictions.climbing: Cannot climb or traverse vertical obstacles
special_restrictions.swimming: Cannot swim or cross water obstacles

travel_effects.forced_rest: Must rest every 2 days of travel instead of choice
travel_effects.movement_penalty: Travel 25% slower, +2 additional fatigue per day

light.description: You feel nimble and quick, unencumbered by excess weight

normal.description: You carry a reasonable load that doesn't hinder your performance

overloaded.description: You cannot carry any more weight and must drop items to continue
overloaded.forced_action: Must reduce weight to encumbered level or below to take any actions

overweight.description: The extra weight slows you down and makes you more noticeable

travel_effects.movement_penalty: Travel 10% slower, +1 additional fatigue per day

flee_attempt_modifier.encumbered: Cannot flee at close range (0-3 distance)

fatigue_system_modifications.description: Weight category modifies daily fatigue accumulation
fatigue_system_modifications.encumbered: Daily travel fatigue increased from 1 to 3
fatigue_system_modifications.overweight: Daily travel fatigue increased from 1 to 2

stealth_encounter_modifications.description: Weight affects ability to avoid or approach encounters

monster_detection_modifier.encumbered: +3 to monster awareness (much easier to detect and ambush)
monster_detection_modifier.light: -2 to monster awareness (harder for monsters to detect you)
monster_detection_modifier.overweight: +1 to monster awareness (easier for monsters to detect you)

warnings.overloaded_prevention: Prevent pickup when it would cause overloaded state

weight_calculation.container_modifier: Items with effects_when_worn can modify weight_capacity stat
weight_calculation.example: STR 14 character with backpack (+35 via effect) = (5 * 14) + 35 = 105 lbs capacity

pack_animals.cost: Variable by location and animal type
pack_animals.description: Future feature: hire pack animals to carry extra weight

selective_gear.description: Choose lighter alternatives or leave non-essential items

storage_solutions.description: Leave items in safe locations like inn rooms or guild storage
